name: Cleanser
directions: Apply a small amount of cleanser onto dampened skin. Gently massage onto skin with a circular motion. Rinse skin thoroughly with water and pat dry. Follow with toner, serum, eye cream, moisturizer, and sunscreen.
skintype: This product is for all skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals.
2) Leaves the skin feeling clean, supple and nourished.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Tilia Cordata (Linden) Flower Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Seed Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Algae Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Matricaria) Flower Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Green And White Tea) Leaf Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed)Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Bisabolol, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Neopentyl Glycol Dicaprate, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Carbomer, Sodium Phytate, Alpha-Isomethyl-Ionone, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene, Limonene, Coumarin, Eugenol, Linalool, Fragrance (Parfum).

name: Toner
directions: After cleansing, pour a generous amount of toner onto a piece of cotton and wipe face, neck and decollete. Allow toner to dry naturally. Follow with eye cream, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen.
skintype: This product is for sensitive, dry and normal skin types.
benefits:
1) Helps to neutralize free radicals with a powerful antioxidant blend.
2) Combats the visible signs of premature aging.
3)Soothes the skin, leaving it calm and refreshed.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Propylene Glycol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Camellia Sinensis (Green And White Tea) Leaf Extract, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Lycium Barbarum (Goji Berry) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Extract, Macrocystis Pyrifera Extract, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Seed Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Algae Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Extract, Uncaria Tomentosa (Cat's Claw) Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Geranium Maculatum (Wild Geranium) Extract, Hydrastis Canadensis (Golden Seal) Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf Stem Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Leaf Extract, Rosa Canina (Rose Hips) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Valeriana Officinalis (Valerian) Rhizome/Root Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Allantoin, Peg-23m, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Phytate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylohyroxamic Acid, Amyl Cinnamic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum).
